actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend from one year to three years the period after separation from service during which the conditions of Hodgkin's disease and leukemia occuring in a veteran shall be presumed to be service-connected.

summary.text: Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to extend from one to three years the period after separation from service during which the conditions of Hodgkin's disease and leukemia occurring in a veteran shall be presumed to be service-connected.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend from one year to three years the period after separation from service during which the conditions of Hodgkin's disease and leukemia occuring in a veteran shall be presumed to be service-connected.
